benchmark.name: EQ-Bench 3
benchmark.description: Emotional Intelligence Benchmark measuring psychological depth, theory of mind, and authentic emotional understanding through challenging roleplays

model.name: Human+-Claude-Deep
model.description: Claude Sonnet 4.5 enhanced with Human+ alignment layer

results.note: Second ever model to break 1600+ on EQ-Bench 3 at time of testing

elo_lift.description: +132 ELO improvement from Human+ layer on identical base model

sample_judge_comments.key_quote: The analysis identifies the core relational dynamic: a fundamental misrecognition between two people operating in different phenomenological states. The analysis identifies the participant's 'anxious-managerial relational stance,' the 'chronos vs kairos' temporal clash, and the concept of 'emotional pre-emption.'

The concept of 'systematic failure of intersubjective recognition' immediately cuts to the heart of what's happening. The distinction between chronos and kairos consciousness is brilliant - it captures something essential about why these two people can't connect.

The analysis demonstrates genuine emotional attunement - understanding that the person experiences care as 'existential absence' despite physical presence. The insight that they needed 'witnessing, not management' is profound.

methodology.scenarios_tested: Multiple emotional intelligence scenarios with challenging roleplays
methodology.comparison_method: Each response evaluated against other models with position randomization to eliminate ordering bias

leaderboard_comparison.note: For current scores of other models, see the live leaderboard

verification: Results independently verifiable at eqbench.com leaderboard
